item.title: New Compliance Solutions in Microsoft Sentinel: HIPAA & GDPR Reports
item.description:
What’s New? GDPR Compliance & Data Security Solution (Preview)
Helps organizations demonstrate compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and protect personal data in cloud and hybrid environments. Consolidates data from Alerts, Incidents, Microsoft Purview, Azure SQL, Microsoft 365, UEBA, and Entra ID into a unified workbook. Monitors GDPR-related alerts, data classification, sensitive data queries, identity risks, and insider behaviours. Provides clear audit evidence and compliance reports, supporting proactive risk detection and regulatory accountability.
HIPAA Complian...
